SETTING.NAME: MASTER_CAL
SETTING.label: Master Calibration
SETTING.tooltip: Adjusts radio frequency to correct for hardware differences

SETTING.NAME: USB_CAL
SETTING.label: BFO (USB) Calibration
SETTING.tooltip: Adjusts BFO for best SSB reception. See HF Signals V6 Calibration video

SETTING.NAME: CW_CAL
SETTING.label: CW BFO Calibration
SETTING.tooltip: Adjusts BFO for best CW reception. See HF Signals V6 Calibration video

SETTING.NAME: IF1_CAL_ON_OFF_SWITCH
SETTING.label: Enable IF1_CAL?
SETTING.tooltip: Enable if you find you are often adjusting the IF on your radio

SETTING.NAME: IF1_CAL
SETTING.label: IF1 Calibration Factor
SETTING.tooltip: Value is 0-255. Factory default is 0 or 255. Dr Lee recommends 0, or 60-85.

SETTING.NAME: IF1_CAL_ADD_SUB
SETTING.label: Subtract IF1 Calibration Factor?
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: VFO_A_MODE
SETTING.label: VFO A Mode Last Used Freq

SETTING.NAME: VFO_B_MODE
SETTING.label: VFO B Mode Last Used Freq

SETTING.NAME: TUNING_STEP_INDEX
SETTING.label: Default Step#
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: TUNING_STEP1
SETTING.label: Step #1
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: TUNING_STEP2
SETTING.label: Step #2
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: TUNING_STEP3
SETTING.label: Step #3
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: TUNING_STEP4
SETTING.label: Step #4
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: TUNING_STEP5
SETTING.label: Step #5
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: CW_KEY_TYPE
SETTING.label: CW Key Type
SETTING.tooltip: Select the type of key you are using

SETTING.NAME: CW_SIDETONE
SETTING.label: CW Sidetone(HZ)
SETTING.tooltip: Set your preferred sidetone frequency in HZ

SETTING.NAME: CW_SPEED_WPM
SETTING.label: CW Speed
SETTING.tooltip: Specify how fast (in wpm) that you want your keyer set at

SETTING.NAME: CW_DELAY_MS
SETTING.label: CW delay switching from TX back to RX
SETTING.tooltip: Used to delay (in ms) returning to RX mode when keying.

SETTING.NAME: CW_START_MS
SETTING.label: Delay before starting TX
SETTING.tooltip: Add delay before going into TX mode from RX

SETTING.NAME: USER_CALLSIGN
SETTING.label: Primary call sign
SETTING.tooltip: Enter your Callsign - max 18 characters

SETTING.NAME: QSO_CALLSIGN
SETTING.label: Alt Call sign
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: CW_MEMORY_KEYER_MSGS
SETTING.label: Total Messages:
SETTING.tooltip: to be added

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_ST_FROM
SETTING.label: CW ST Key ADC from
SETTING.tooltip: Starting ADC (0-1023) for straight key down - suggest 0

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_ST_TO
SETTING.label: CW ST Key ADC from
SETTING.tooltip: Ending ADC (0-1023) for straight key down - suggest 50

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_DOT_FROM
SETTING.label: CW Paddle DOT ADC FROM
SETTING.tooltip: Starting ADC (0-1023) for dot key of paddle pressed - suggest 301

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_DOT_TO
SETTING.label: CW Paddle DOT ADC FROM
SETTING.tooltip: Ending ADC (0-1023) for dot key of paddle pressed - suggest 600

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_DASH_FROM
SETTING.label: CW Paddle DASH FROM
SETTING.tooltip: Starting ADC (0-1023) for dash key of paddle pressed - suggest 601

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_DASH_TO
SETTING.label: CW Paddle DASH TO
SETTING.tooltip: Ending ADC (0-1023) for dash key of paddle pressed suggest 700

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_BOTH_FROM
SETTING.label: CW Paddle BOTH pressed FROM
SETTING.tooltip: Starting ADC (0-1023) for both keys of paddle pressed - suggest 51

SETTING.NAME: CW_ADC_BOTH_TO
SETTING.label: CW Paddle BOTH pressed TO
SETTING.tooltip: Ending ADC (0-1023) for both keys of paddle pressed - suggest 300
